entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
